listitem.para: ELLIPSE does not move the turtle. It draws an ellipse based on the turtle heading, turtle position and given arguments. The size is based on the minor and major values. The minor parameter is the shortest distance along the ellipse to the center point. The major parameter is the longest distance along the ellipse the center point. The center-point of the ellipse will be the turtle's current position.

programlisting.userinput: ; a 2D example ELLIPSE 100 200 CLEARSCREEN ELLIPSE 50 50 CLEARSCREEN ELLIPSE 50 50
